text: My Motherland () is a 1933 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits and Aleksandr Zarkhi.Место силы"Моя Родина"Моя Родина It stars Bari Haydarov, Gennadiy Michurin, and Aleksandr Melnikov. == Actors == * Bari Haydarov as Van * Gennadiy Michurin as Vaska * Aleksandr Melnikov as Vasya * Yanina Zheymo as Olya * Yun Fa-shu as The Manchurian officer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1933 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi
title: My Motherland (movie)
